item.title: Tips for a Better Life
item.description: Possessions If you want people’s real opinions on a product, look for them on Reddit. You will get real opinions and arguments rather than curated SEO results If your bank charges you for an account, have a good explanation for what his money is buying you Things you use for a significant friction of your life are worth investing in “Where is the good knife?” If you are looking for your good X, you have bad Xs.
